title: FSIS Issues Public Health Alert for Ground Beef Products  Due to Possible E. Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, April 20, 2024 – The U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) is issuing a public health alert for ground beef products that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7. FSIS is issuing this public health alert to ensure that consumers...
impacted_products: See list of products in press release
